title: Benihana serves Hibachi Chateaubriand as 8.5 ounces of center cut tenderloin
statement: Benihana's Hibachi Chateaubriand consists of 8.5 ounces of center cut tenderloin and mushrooms lightly seasoned.

citations.quote: HIBACHI CHATEAUBRIAND* 8.5 ounces of center cut tenderloin and mushrooms lightly seasoned.
